# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut)


target_compile_options(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic
)

target_link_libraries(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  src-client-topic
  core-testlib-default
  cpp-testing-gmock_in_unittest
  public-lib-json_value
  public-lib-yson_value
  src-client-driver
  topic-ut-ut_utils
  persqueue_public-ut-ut_utils
  persqueue-ut-common
  tx-schemeshard-ut_helpers
  library-cpp-resource
)

target_allocator(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)

target_link_options(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/basic_usage_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/describe_topic_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/direct_read_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/local_partition_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/topic_to_table_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/with_direct_read_ut/595c8d08f14d8e7791461abe94aa0089.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  TEST_TARGET
  src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  "PQ_EXPERIMENTAL_DIRECT_READ=1"
)

resources(src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/with_direct_read_ut/595c8d08f14d8e7791461abe94aa0089.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/resources/topic_A_partition_0_v24-4-2.dat
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/src/client/topic/ut/resources/topic_A_partition_1_v24-4-2.dat

  topic_A_partition_1_v24-4-2.dat
  OPTS
)

  TEST
  src-client-topic-ut-with_direct_read_ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
